mapper.select: SELECT I.ID ,I.NAME ,I.PRICE ,I.STOCK ,I.DELETED_AT ,C.ID AS C_ID ,C.NAME AS C_NAME FROM ITEMS I INNER JOIN CATEGORIES C ON C.ID = I.CATEGORY_ID
SELECT I.ID ,I.NAME ,I.PRICE ,I.STOCK ,I.DELETED_AT ,C.ID AS C_ID ,C.NAME AS C_NAME FROM ITEMS I INNER JOIN CATEGORIES C ON C.ID = I.CATEGORY_ID WHERE I.ID = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ITEMS (ID, NAME, PRICE, CATEGORY_ID) VALUES (ITEM_ID_SEQ.nextval, #{name}, #{price}, #{category.id})
mapper.update: UPDATE ITEMS SET NAME = #{name}, PRICE = #{price}, CATEGORY_ID = #{category.id} WHERE ID = #{id}
